body_html: It's planned to add support for data_format argument values such as NHWC, etc. It will be easy, too, and we'll get to it soon. @martinwicke: what do you mean by "modes we don't support", is it e.g. C* formats? Or is it the fact that a lot of TF ops support some formats but not others? (e.g. conv3d, bias_add, etc...

body: It's planned to add support for `data_format` argument values such as `NHWC`, etc. It will be easy, too, and we'll get to it soon. @martinwicke: what do you mean by "modes we don't support", is it e.g. `C*` formats? Or is it the fact that a lot of TF ops support some formats but not others? (e.g. `conv3d`, `bias_add`, etc...
